QuestData.Title: The Amphitheater of Anguish: From Beyond!
QuestData.Description: I'm not gonna lie to you, pal. You might be overmatched here. This next one is a being from the elemental planes! I don't even know what's gonna show up in that arena!$B$BIf you think you're up to it, get in there and give 'em hell!
QuestData.LogDescription: Get in the arena at the Amphitheater of Anguish and defeat one of the elemental lords! Return to Wodin the Troll-Servant to redeem your reward.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Wodin the Troll-Servant at Amphitheater of Anguish in Zul'Drak.
QuestData.CompletionText: No payout until the fight's over, $g man:lady;.
QuestData.RewardText: Unbelievable! I thought this whole place was going to explode when it first appeared! You really dominated that round!
